pages.title: Ice Cream Sandwich
pages.text: Ice cream sandwiches are a delight that you can eat multiple times! Each ice cream sandwich has 4 bites you can take.$(br2)When you eat an ice cream sandwich, you get a weakened version of the effect of the flavor.

pages.title: Ice Cream Sandwich
pages.text: To create an ice cream sandwich, stick an ice cream ball between two cookies using a scooper. The sandwich would then have the ice cream flavor that you chose.
